sentences.sContent: Which book are you looking for?
Which are the most important crops?
sentences.sCn: 哪些农作物是最重要的？

sentences.sContent: Miranda was sure it was one of them, but was not sure which.
sentences.sCn: 米兰达确定此人是他们其中的一个，但不能肯定是哪一个。

trans.tranOther: used to ask or talk about one or more members of a group of people or things, when you are uncertain about it or about them
